_comment: GitHub MCP Registry Manifest - Complete Tool Definitions
_purpose: Metadata for GitHub MCP Registry listing and tool discovery
name: alpaca-mcp-server
description: Comprehensive Alpaca Trading API integration for Model Context Protocol, enabling natural language trading operations through AI assistants
author: Alpaca

required_env_vars.name: ALPACA_API_KEY
required_env_vars.description: Alpaca API key for trading account access

required_env_vars.name: ALPACA_SECRET_KEY
required_env_vars.description: Alpaca secret key for trading account access

tools.name: get_account_info
tools.description: Retrieves current account information including balances, buying power, and account status

tools.name: get_all_positions
tools.description: Retrieves all current positions in the portfolio with details like quantity, market value, and P&L

tools.name: get_open_position
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific open position

symbol.description: The symbol name of the asset (e.g., 'AAPL', 'MSFT')

tools.name: get_asset
tools.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific asset including trading status and attributes

symbol.description: The symbol of the asset to get information for

tools.name: get_all_assets
tools.description: Retrieves all available assets with optional filtering by status, class, and exchange

status.description: Filter by asset status (e.g., active, inactive)

asset_class.description: Filter by asset class (e.g., us_equity, crypto)

tools.name: get_corporate_actions
tools.description: Retrieves corporate action announcements like earnings, dividends, and stock splits

ca_types.description: Types of corporate actions to filter by

symbols.description: List of symbols to filter by

tools.name: get_portfolio_history
tools.description: Retrieves account portfolio history (equity and P/L) over a requested time window

date_end.description: Alternative end as ISO date or datetime

tools.name: create_watchlist
tools.description: Creates a new watchlist with specified symbols for tracking assets

symbols.description: List of symbols to add to the watchlist

tools.name: get_watchlists
tools.description: Retrieves all watchlists for the account with their symbols

tools.name: update_watchlist_by_id
tools.description: Updates an existing watchlist by modifying name or symbols

watchlist_id.description: ID of the watchlist to update

symbols.description: New list of symbols for the watchlist

tools.name: get_watchlist_by_id
tools.description: Get a specific watchlist by its ID

tools.name: add_asset_to_watchlist_by_id
tools.description: Add an asset by symbol to a specific watchlist by ID

tools.name: remove_asset_from_watchlist_by_id
tools.description: Remove an asset by symbol from a specific watchlist by ID

tools.name: delete_watchlist_by_id
tools.description: Delete a specific watchlist by its ID

tools.name: get_calendar
tools.description: Retrieves market calendar for specified date range showing trading days and holidays

tools.name: get_clock
tools.description: Retrieves current market status and next open/close times

tools.name: get_stock_latest_quote
tools.description: Retrieves the latest quote for a stock including bid/ask prices and volumes

tools.name: get_stock_bars
tools.description: Retrieves historical stock price bars (OHLCV data) with flexible timeframes

limit.description: Maximum number of bars to return

tools.name: get_stock_trades
tools.description: Retrieves historical trade data for a stock with individual trade details

limit.description: Maximum number of trades to return

sort.description: Sort order: ASC or DESC (default: ASC)

tools.name: get_stock_latest_trade
tools.description: Retrieves the latest trade information for a stock

tools.name: get_stock_latest_bar
tools.description: Retrieves the most recent minute bar for a stock

tools.name: get_stock_snapshot
tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive snapshot with latest quote, trade, minute bar, daily bar, and previous daily bar

symbol_or_symbols.description: Single symbol or list of symbols

tools.name: get_crypto_bars
tools.description: Retrieves historical cryptocurrency price bars with OHLCV data

tools.name: get_crypto_quotes
tools.description: Retrieves historical cryptocurrency quote data with bid/ask information

tools.name: get_crypto_trades
tools.description: Retrieves historical trade prints for one or more cryptocurrencies

tools.name: get_crypto_latest_quote
tools.description: Returns the latest quote for one or more crypto symbols

tools.name: get_crypto_latest_bar
tools.description: Returns the latest minute bar for one or more crypto symbols

tools.name: get_crypto_latest_trade
tools.description: Returns the latest trade for one or more crypto symbols

tools.name: get_crypto_snapshot
tools.description: Returns snapshots including latest trade, quote, minute bar, daily and previous daily bars for crypto symbols

tools.name: get_crypto_latest_orderbook
tools.description: Returns the latest orderbook for one or more crypto symbols

tools.name: get_option_contracts
tools.description: Searches for option contracts with flexible filtering by expiration, strike price, and type

expiration_date_gte.description: Expiration date greater than or equal to

expiration_date_lte.description: Expiration date less than or equal to

limit.description: Maximum number of contracts to return

tools.name: get_option_latest_quote
tools.description: Retrieves the latest quote for an option contract with bid/ask prices and Greeks

tools.name: get_option_snapshot
tools.description: Retrieves comprehensive snapshots of option contracts including latest trade, quote, implied volatility, and Greeks

symbol_or_symbols.description: Single option symbol or list of option symbols

tools.name: get_orders
tools.description: Retrieves order history with filtering options by status, date range, and limits

status.description: Filter by order status: all, open, closed, filled, etc. (default: all)

limit.description: Maximum number of orders to return (default: 10)

tools.name: place_stock_order
tools.description: Places a stock order with support for market, limit, stop, stop-limit, and trailing-stop orders

order_type.description: Order type: market, limit, stop, stop_limit, trailing_stop (default: market)

limit_price.description: Limit price for limit and stop_limit orders

stop_price.description: Stop price for stop and stop_limit orders

time_in_force.description: Time in force: day, gtc, ioc, fok (default: day)

tools.name: place_crypto_order
tools.description: Places a cryptocurrency order with support for market, limit, and stop-limit orders

time_in_force.description: Time in force: gtc, ioc (default: gtc)

limit_price.description: Limit price for limit and stop_limit orders

tools.name: cancel_all_orders
tools.description: Cancels all open orders and returns the status of each cancellation

tools.name: cancel_order_by_id
tools.description: Cancels a specific order by its ID

order_id.description: The UUID of the order to cancel

tools.name: close_position
tools.description: Closes a specific position for a single symbol, either partially or completely

symbol.description: Symbol of the position to close

tools.name: close_all_positions
tools.description: Closes all open positions in the portfolio

cancel_orders.description: Whether to cancel all open orders before liquidating positions (default: false)

tools.name: exercise_options_position
tools.description: Exercises a held option contract, converting it into the underlying asset

symbol_or_contract_id.description: Option contract symbol (e.g., 'NVDA250919C001680') or contract ID

tools.name: place_option_market_order
tools.description: Places option orders including single-leg and multi-leg strategies like spreads and straddles

legs.description: List of option legs with symbol, side, and quantity

order_class.description: Order class: simple, bracket, oco, or mleg

time_in_force.description: Time in force: day, gtc, ioc, fok (default: day)

requirements.alpaca_account: Required - Free paper trading or paid live account
